transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Madhav sir.
Customer: Ha sir boliye na.
Executive: Jo aapne hame diya hai na sir company ka naam, theek hai? Ha ha. To us company ko dekh raha tha, ek company naam aane lag raha hu, ye IndiaMART pe registered nahi hai sir. Ye band ho chuki hai IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Kamal textile karke company hai na sir?
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Ye company recent mein agar main baat karu abhi, to shuru hui kitne dinon mein, main bata deta hu. 24, 24 September 2021 ko ye company band hai sir IndiaMART pe. Pehle chalti thi, ab nahi chalti hai sir.
Customer: Sir complaint to apan raise kar sakte hai na?
Executive: Bilkul sir, mujhe complaint raise karne mein koi issue nahi hai sir. Dekho sir, waise to main aapko bata du sir, hum IndiaMART pe jaise complaint mein bhi, query aapka daal deta hu. Aapne already saari cheeze hame bhej di hai, to main complaint to raise kar dunga sir. But solution mein kya hai ki hum sir unhi company pe action le sakte hai jo IndiaMART pe registered hai sir. Ha obviously sir, hamare paas hai.
Customer: Incident raise hoyega to agle ko jayega, notification jayega to agla kuch phone bilkul.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir, bilkul sir, bilkul sir jayega, bilkul sir. Main abhi daal ke aapko ek ticket ID bhi de dunga. Us ticket ID se jo bhi updates aayenge sir aapko milte rahenge. Theek hai? Aap mujhe thoda sa 10 minute ka time de do. Main isko daal ke turant aapko call back karta hu sir. Theek hai? Iska kya tha mujhe sir ek baar pura issue bata do. Kya tha, kitne tarikh ko payment kiya tha sir? Aapke paas thoda sa mujhe chat chat wagera hai aapke paas?
Customer: Ha mere paas hai, maine WhatsApp kar diya unko. 172000 ka bill tha. Do mahine ho gaye. Sirf 1 lakh rupaye aaya, 72000 ban gaya.
Executive: Achha 172 tha, unhone aapko 1 lakh rupaye de diye, 72000 rupaye nahi diya. Uske liye aapne sir unko phone wagera ya matlab inke offline wagera visit kiye the sir aapke paas kitna door hai sir ye?
Customer: Nahi nahi yaha se to sir kam se kam 1000 kilometer hai ye door.
Executive: Achha 1000 kilometer door hai. Achha achha samajh gaya sir. To sir aapki koi baat hui thi matlab ki part payment ke aadha ma jaise bhi hota hai na ki bahut sare mere businessman hai wo log kya karte hai product deliver location pe kar dete hai. But jab tak pura payment receive nahi hota tab tak order dete nahi hai sir. Wahi pe hold karke rakhte hai. Jo bhi unke delivery kiya hai aur maine unko screenshot bheja hai madam ko.
Executive: Ha main le leta hu unse, koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, main complaint raise karke aapko daal deta hu sir. Bas mujhe aap do minute de sir, theek hai? Kamal textile karke hai, in Tamil Nadu ki company hai na sir, Satish Kumar?
Customer: Bilkul sir.
Executive: Theek hai, ye 8 saal se pehle the IndiaMART pe, par 2021 inhone band kar diya hai. Baaki main ek baar daal deta hu sir, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Do minute dijiye sir, main turant aapko call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive full payment.

- Wants to raise a complaint against the company.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to raise a complaint.

- Executive will provide a ticket ID for updates.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, payment, buyleads
